Title: Establishes the New York state lead-safe renovation, repair and painting act
Summary: Establishes the "New York state lead-safe renovation, repair and painting act"; establishes standards for lead-safe renovation, repair and painting of residential properties; requires documentation of compliance with such standards.
LawCode: Add Art 31-A §§925 - 928, Lab L; amd §381, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the executive law, in relation to establishing the "New York state lead-safe renovation, repair and painting act"
